pkgmetadata.longdescription: Superior Identification Index and Its Extensions // Calculate superior identification index and its extensions. Measure the performance of journals based on how well they could identify the top papers by any index (e.g. citation indices) according to Huang Yang. (2022) doi:10.1007/s11192-022-04372-z. These methods could be extended to evaluate other entities such as institutes, countries, etc.
